name: EtherShip - Whalers in Space Alpha 1.2
description:
#######################################################

The problem where the game chrashed should have been fixed! please try the game.

#######################################################

This is our first-year project as game developers.

It´s a Tower Defence game in space where you can feel the gravity around towers and your mission is to get away from the government while catching SpaceWhales. 

HOWEVER the whales bugged a lot so for now, it is just a fairly normal Tower Defence with aspects of gravity.

For now there is no animations and we use a couple  of placeholders and be aware that if your computer only got 2 cores, you might experience some lag since we need to optimize our threading

 We have used the last 6 weeks on making this game and after we finish our exams we will continue to develop on this project. we would love to get some feedback from all of you.

When the enemies come in contact with you, you'll loose health and the game end when your health comes to 0.
Killing enemies grants score and credits, where the credits are used to build buildings.

CONTROLS:

Left mouse click - place tower/wall

Right mouse click - remove tower/wall

P - starts the wave when in between rounds.

B - when in between rounds you enter build mode. When in build mode you won't be able to move. 

N - when in build mode you exit it.

1 - build Tower

2 - build Wall

W - forward

A - turn left

D - turn right

Q - ability to disable gravitaion for a short periode. The ability got a cooldown.

Made by: Anders Vestergaard, Nikolaj Hentze, Daniel Laursen & Nicklas Nielsen
